entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to Yacht's new documentation. It's built with Docusaurusv2 which uses react to build out the documentation, blog, and main website. I'll be posting updated about new features, releases, and tutorials as I'm able to.
entry.content:
Welcome to Yacht's new documentation. It's built with Docusaurusv2 which uses react to build out the documentation, blog, and main website. I'll be posting updated about new features, releases, and tutorials as I'm able to.

If you run into any trouble please check out the SelfhostedPro Discord Server and post in the #tech-support or #yacht-support channel.
